Hero.title: Make tax prep easy
Hero.paragraph: We are Independent Tax Consultation and Preparation Services, LLC, a tax preparation company based in Irvington, NJ.

About.paragraph: At Independent Tax Consultation and Preparation Services, LLC, our mission is to deliver comprehensive and tailored tax consultation and preparation services to individuals, families, and businesses. We take great pride in our personalized approach, ensuring that each client receives the attention and expertise they need to navigate the complexities of tax compliance and preparation.

Owner.paragraph1: Edward Battle, the dynamic owner and founder of Independent Tax Consultation and Preparation Services, LLC, spearheads a respected firm with over two decades of tax industry expertise. Launching his career at H&R Block in 1998, Edward meticulously honed his skills and knowledge, which led to the establishment of his own tax business in 2021. His unwavering commitment to assisting individuals and organizations is reflected in his extensive experience preparing various types of tax returns.
Owner.paragraph2: Throughout his career, Edward has expertly managed thousands of individual returns, partnership filings, sole proprietorship taxes, non-profit organization returns, and estate and trust tax filings. Beyond his practical experience, Edward has played a pivotal role in sharing his expertise by teaching both basic and advanced tax courses at H&R Block for approximately 10 years. His passion for imparting knowledge and empowering others has been a cornerstone of his career.
